channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Tiburon Peninsula crew sails to third J105 title in four years
item.description: Team Niuhi overcame a broken mast two weeks before the regatta to dominate the field.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Tiburon cyclist will embark on 625-mile ride to raise money for disabled athletes
item.description: Harband has already raised more than $11,000 toward his $15,000 goal for the Challenged Athletes Foundation's Million Dollar Challenge.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Tiburon parks board to tackle safety issues along Old Rail Trail
item.description: A uniform 8 mph speed limit and separate paths for cyclists and pedestrians are among the potential changes being explored.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Signed, worn, remembered: Tiburon collector preserves moments that shaped him
item.description: Scanlon's 200-piece collection includes Dwight Clark's cleats, Reggie Jackson's bat and even locks of hair from an unnamed Beatle.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Everyday Encounters: A relaxing escape fishing off Elephant Rock pier
item.description: Hernandez documents his Bay Area fishing adventures on social media, where he connected with his friend Benitez over their shared hobby.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Zheng takes Tiburon Challenger crown in flawless week
item.description: The Columbia University senior didn't drop a single set en route to his third consecutive Challenger title.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Tiburon picks designers to bring new life to town's parks
item.description: Community feedback from two years of engagement will guide designers creating plans for the former sanitation ponds site and mini parks.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Town Hall, library could combine as joint hub for residents in emergencies
item.description: Local officials plan microgrid connecting Town Hall and library for emergency power during natural disasters and public safety shutoffs.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Triathlete and finance veteran joins Strawberry Rec board
item.description: Triathlete Doug Twillman joins Strawberry Rec board, bringing 40 years of financial experience to help oversee district operations.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister
